attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Isn’t it about time that the Government intervened into the business activities of the petroleum industries?
These industries are making billion pound yearly profits by increasing the petrol & diesel prices which are having a profound / negative effect on the nation’s economy.
Given the poor excuses for raising fuel costs, nearly doubling the average cost of fuel at the pumps in the course of under a year, shouldn’t Governments unite to ‘Nationalise' these industries that have the capability of  ‘braking’ an economy ?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
